name: Accurate Fire Gator Simulator
description:
COME ONE COME ALL TO THE WORLDS FIRST ACCURATE FIRE GATOR SIMULATOR.

-Experience 20 - 30 seconds of action-packed, gator-talking gameplay!
-Discover the wonder of talking to the fire gator himself.
-Feel the awe of being asked interesting and relevant questions.

Play today!

Made by SirMilkman
